objects.name: Analytic 1362
objects.description: Monitor server and endpoint logs for unusual outbound network connections to cryptocurrency nodes, unauthorized scripts accessing financial systems, or automation targeting payment file formats. Detect curl/wget activity aimed at exfiltrating transaction data or credentials from financial apps.

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: auditd:SYSCALL
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: execve: Execution of curl, wget, or custom scripts accessing financial endpoints

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: linux:syslog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Authentication attempts into finance-related servers from unusual IPs or times

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: Whitelisted IPs for finance-related traffic to reduce noise.
